Magmeld Emissary Leader Lada:
You know, what is now the situation in the villages? You do not see where the former splendor.
Some time ago there was a fierce Magmelde disease. People were dying in agony, their flesh and bones decay, and nobody could do anything.
We hypothesized that the cause of the disaster, perhaps, served as a dark-red mist, which appeared in those parts together with the craze.
